resources.string:
Instructions :

 • Check if your device's Wifi is connected to VOLSBB network.

 • When using first time, Login using the "Save and Login" option to use the notification login feature for the next time.

 • Functionalities :

	 > Log In - Use this to login to VOLSBB without saving your credentials.
	 > Save & Log In - Use this to login VOLSBB and overwrite the existing saved credentials.
	 > Log Out - Use this to logout the active VOLSBB session.

 • Notification functionality :

	 > You will get notified every time your device connects to VOLSBB network with two action buttons Login and Logout.
	 > Login using notification will always use your saved credentials.
	 > Once you disconnect from VOLSBB network, notification will automatically disappear.
Pronto Networks Account Renewal Date Information
Please provide me the date of monthly data renewal of my Pronto Network Account. My username is:
